content: pattern co 37 41 47 55 57 in mc with us #6/4 00 mm 24 in-32 in/60-80 cm circular needle row 1 k1 *k1 p1 repeat from * to last 2 sts k2 row 2 p1 *p1 k1 repeat from * to last 2 sts p2 repeat row 1 and 2 throughout for 1x1 rib with selvedge sts work 12 12 12 16 16 row in 1x1 rib switch to us #10/6 00mm 24 in-32 in/60-80 cm circular needle and continue working according to color pattern pg 4 and using charts 1 and 2c sleeves through row 103 103 103 101 103 *read the directions for the color patterns before working color pattern charts you have already worked the first 12 12 12 16 16 row of the color pattern before switching to the larger needle at the same time work shaping as follows starting with first increase on row 5 increase at each side every 4 row 6 8 8 7 6 times then increase each side every 6 row 13 11 11 12 13 times 75 79 85 93 95 sts every other increase should be a m1pw in order to keep the 1x1 rib pattern so on row 5 k2 m1 work to last 2 sts in 1x1 rib m1 k2 then on row 9 k2 m1pw work to last 2 sts in 1x1 rib m1pw k2 continue this pattern throughout to maintain 1x1 rib pattern continue working as established through row 104 104 104 102 104 sleeve cap shaping note on chart 2c as you decrease you will have fewer than 67 sts continue to work the chart as established across all the stitches you do have starting on row 105 105 105 103 105 bo6 at the beginning of next 2 row working the rest of the row in 1x1 rib and color pattern 63 67 73 81 83 sts remain bo2 at the beginning of next 2 row working the rest of the row in 1x1 rib and color pattern 59 63 69 77 79 sts remain www andreaknits com the dude 8 copyright © andrea rangel 2013 decrease 1 st each side every rs row 7 times as follows rs k1 ssk work even in 1x1 rib to last 3 sts k2tog k1 ws work even in 1x1 rib then decrease 1 st at each side every row 7 times as follows rs k1 ssk work even in 1x1 rib to last 3 sts k2tog k1 ws p1 p2tog work even in 1x1 rib to last 3 sts p2togtbl p1 31 35 41 49 51 sts remain starting on the next rs bo5 at the beginning of the next 4 row working all other sts even in 1x1 rib 11 15 21 29 31 sts remain bobble all remain sts in 1x1 rib finishing facings make 2 alike with smallest needle co13 13 13 15 15 work 26 26 26 27 27 inches in 1x1 rib as follows rs row k2 *p1 k1
